message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $9000 is lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $12000?  That would give us both a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $12000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle again?
